refnamediv.refpurpose: Get number of rows in result

refsect1.title: Description

note.para: If you use mysql_unbuffered_query, mysql_num_rows will not return the correct value until all the rows in the result set have been retrieved.

refsect1.para: See also mysql_affected_rows, mysql_connect, mysql_data_seek, mysql_select_db and mysql_query.
For downward compatibility mysql_numrows can also be used. This is deprecated however.
